title: Generation 2000 = Whakatupuranga rua mano
creator_credit: Nan Wehipeihana, Carol J Paewai, TopShelf Productions and Nga Kara Whetu
brief_description:
Episode number 6 of Series “From spirit to spirit (A)”.
In order to ensure that their tribal cultures and traditions survive and thrive into the next millenium, Maori people have fought to develop a 25 year plan to integrate their traditional way of life into current educational programs.
creator_credit_for_label: Nan Wehipeihana, Carol J Paewai, TopShelf Productions and Nga Kara Whetu
